entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Blowing snow in outlying areas overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming north 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
